text: Joujouka is a Japanese big beat project from Tokyo formed by Takeshi Isogai and Tsuyoshi Suzuki. ==Discography== *Joujouka (Matsuri Productions 1998) *New Asians (Psy-Harmonics / Radiosonic Records 2002) *Are You Elovetric? (Mad Skippers / Radiosonic Records 2003) *re-MODEL (Mad Skippers / Radiosonic Records 2004) *Never Look Back (Mad Skippers / Digilla / Psy-Harmonics 2006) ==Other works== *Rez — (2001), (SEGA Entertainment, Inc., UGA): Interactive music for the cyberpunk-themed music shooter. ==External links== * Official website Category:Techno music groups Category:Trance music groups Category:Japanese pop music groups Category:Japanese electronic music groups
title: Joujouka (band)
